scripts.build: MODE=production yarn workspaces foreach -p -t run build && cp etc/tiddlybase-config.json dist/
scripts.build:dev: MODE=development yarn workspaces foreach -t run build:dev && cp etc/tiddlybase-config.json dist/
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach -t run clean && rm -rf dist/*
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy:wiki && yarn deploy:firebase && yarn deploy:files
scripts.version:bump: yarn version -i patch && node scripts/set_version.js "$(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" "$(yarn workspaces list --json)"
